org.jooq
Interface SelectStep

All Superinterfaces:
QueryProvider<SelectQuery>, SelectFromStep, SelectGroupByStep, SelectJoinStep, SelectOrderByStep, SelectWhereStep
All Known Subinterfaces:
Select
public interface SelectStep
extends SelectFromStep

The select step in a Select query

This is the step in query construction, where you can add select fields to a query. This step is optional. After this step, you'll proceed to the SelectFromStep

Author:
Lukas Eder
